ajito_fairy_010_jentle_01:
I will return later when it is time for the young
master’s piano lesson.[VAR 0114(002C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_02: Until then, please give him my regards.[VAR 0114(002C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_04:
And who might you be, young [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0403)]manlady? A friend of
the young master, perhaps?[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_06:
Since you seem unaware, I must inform you that
this is the base of Team Star’s Fairy crew—the\r
Ruchbah Squad led by young Master Ortega.[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_sitappa_02:
Um, Mr. Harrington? I don’t think we’re supposed
to be giving out that information...[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_07: No? Then please accept my apologies.[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_08:
Do you have any idea as to who this young [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0403)]manlady
might be?[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_sitappa_03:
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe’s no friend of ours. Y’know, I think [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she might
be here to try and take us on![VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_09:
Understood. In that case...I take it you’re an
adversary of the young master?[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_10:
Is that so. Well then, that leaves me with one last
thing to ask you...[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_11:
Would you be so kind as to indulge me in a
quick battle?[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_12:
Ah, yes, I suppose you must need to prepare.
I will wait until you have your affairs in order.[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_jentle_15:
However. Be aware that young Master Ortega’s
battle prowess far surpasses my paltry skills.\r
You would do well to take care.[VAR 0114(003C)]
ajito_fairy_010_sitappa_06:
That gentlemanly guy used to be the director of
the academy...I think? Least, that’s what I heard.\c
Now he’s, like, tutoring the boss or something.
He shows up here sometimes to take the boss\r
to his lessons...[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_fairy_010_sitappa_07: Hang on—why am I explaining this to you?![VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_fairy_010_sitappa_08:
There’s no doubting you’re here to make trouble,
so I gotta go let everyone know![VAR 0114(002F)]
